roleset.name: to feel irritated
roleset.note: CHAFE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chafe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from chafe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Government officials who [*T*-1] are urging real-estate reforms balk at the arguments of business leaders and chafe at their pressure .
example.arg: Government officials who [*T*-1] are urging real-estate reforms
